datasource.description: Enable to include datasource information for each linked object.

count.description: Maximum number of entries to return.

skip_to.description: Skip to Nth CMDB entry. Only collect statistical data after it.

with_meta.description: Enable to include meta information about each object (type id, references, etc).

with_contents_hash.description: Enable to include a checksum of each object's contents.

skip.description: Enable to call CLI skip operator to hide skipped properties.

format.description: List of property names to include in results, separated by | (i.e. policyid|srcintf).

filter.description:
Filtering multiple key/value pairs
Operator     |   Description
==     |   Case insensitive match with pattern.
!=     |    Does not match with pattern (case insensitive).
=@     |    Pattern found in object value (case insensitive).
!@     |    ﻿Pattern not﻿ found in object value (case insensitive).
<=     |    Value must be less than or equal to ﻿pattern﻿.
<     |    Value must be less than pattern﻿.
.>=    |    Value must be greater than or equal to ﻿pattern﻿.
.>     |    Value must be greater than ﻿pattern﻿.
Logical OR    |    Separate filters using commas ','
Logical AND    |    Filter strings can be combined to create logical AND queries by including multiple filters in the request.
Combining AND and OR    |    You can combine AND and OR filters together to create more complex filters.

key.description: If present, objects will be filtered on property with this name.

pattern.description: If present, objects will be filtered on property with this value.

datasource_format.description: A map of datasources to a string of attributes, separated by | (ie: policyid|srcintf). If specified, this will add the attributes listed for any linked objects.

unfiltered_count.description: Maximum number of unfiltered entries to interate through.

stat-items.description: Items to count occurrence in entire response (multiple items should be separated by '|').

primary_keys.description: The primary key to find indexes for.

action.description:
default: Return the CLI default values for entire CLI tree.
meta: Return meta data for a specific object, table, or the entire CLI tree.
json-schema: Return JSON Schema for entire CLI tree.
schema: Return schema for entire CLI tree.

vdom.description:
Specify the Virtual Domain(s) from which results are returned or changes are applied to. If this parameter is not provided, the management VDOM will be used. If the admin does not have access to the VDOM, a permission error will be returned.
The URL parameter is one of:
vdom=root (Single VDOM)
vdom=vdom1,vdom2 (Multiple VDOMs)
vdom=* (All VDOMs)

Specify the Virtual Domain(s) from which results are returned or changes are applied to. If this parameter is not provided, the management VDOM will be used. If the admin does not have access to the VDOM, a permission error will be returned.
The URL parameter is one of:
vdom=root (Single VDOM)
vdom=vdom1,vdom2 (Multiple VDOMs)
vdom=* (All VDOMs)

action.description:
If supported, an action can be specified.
_move_: Move this specific resource.
When *action=move* is set, one of the extra parameters (*before*, *after*) must be provided.
__*Note:*__ If this parameter is provided when not supported, the action will be ignored and an “invalid request” error will be returned.

before.description:
If *action=move*, use *before* to specify the ID of the resource that this resource will be moved before.
For example, to move `object 1` to before `object 2`, use:
__action=move&before=2__
__*Note:*__ This parameter can only be used when the *action* parameter is set to *move*.

after.description:
If *action=move*, use *after* to specify the ID of the resource that this resource will be moved after.
For example, to move `object 1` to after `object 3`, use:
__action=move&after=3__
__*Note:*__ This parameter can only be used when the *action* parameter is set to *move*.

scope.description:
Specify the Scope from which results are returned or changes are applied to. Objects are only existed in VDOMs scope.
scope=vdom

GET.summary:
Select all entries in a CLI table.
 Access Group: sysgrp

PUT.summary:
Update this specific resource.
 Access Group: sysgrp

status.name: status
status.help:
Enable/disable Modem support (equivalent to bringing an interface up or down).   
enable:Enable setting.   
disable:Disable setting.

pin-init.name: pin-init
pin-init.help: AT command to set the PIN (AT+PIN=<pin>).

network-init.name: network-init
network-init.help: AT command to set the Network name/type (AT+COPS=<mode>,[<format>,<oper>[,<AcT>]]).

lockdown-lac.name: lockdown-lac
lockdown-lac.help: Allow connection only to the specified Location Area Code (LAC).

mode.name: mode
mode.help:
Set MODEM operation mode to redundant or standalone.   
standalone:Standalone.   
redundant:Redundant for an interface.

auto-dial.name: auto-dial
auto-dial.help:
Enable/disable auto-dial after a reboot or disconnection.   
enable:Enable setting.   
disable:Disable setting.

dial-on-demand.name: dial-on-demand
dial-on-demand.help:
Enable/disable to dial the modem when packets are routed to the modem interface.   
enable:Enable setting.   
disable:Disable setting.

idle-timer.name: idle-timer
idle-timer.help: MODEM connection idle time (1 - 9999 min, default = 5).

redial.name: redial
redial.help:
Redial limit (1 - 10 attempts, none = redial forever).   
none:Forever.   
1:One attempt.   
2:Two attempts.   
3:Three attempts.   
4:Four attempts.   
5:Five attempts.   
6:Six attempts.   
7:Seven attempts.   
8:Eight attempts.   
9:Nine attempts.   
10:Ten attempts.

reset.name: reset
reset.help: Number of dial attempts before resetting modem (0 = never reset).

holddown-timer.name: holddown-timer
holddown-timer.help: Hold down timer in seconds (1 - 60 sec).

wireless-port.name: wireless-port
wireless-port.help: Enter wireless port number: 0 for default, 1 for first port, and so on (0 - 4294967295).

dont-send-CR1.name: dont-send-CR1
dont-send-CR1.help:
Do not send CR when connected (ISP1).   
enable:Enable setting.   
disable:Disable setting.

phone1.name: phone1
phone1.help: Phone number to connect to the dialup account (must not contain spaces, and should include standard special characters).

dial-cmd1.name: dial-cmd1
dial-cmd1.help: Dial command (this is often an ATD or ATDT command).

username1.name: username1
username1.help: User name to access the specified dialup account.

passwd1.name: passwd1
passwd1.help: Password to access the specified dialup account.

peer-modem1.name: peer-modem1
peer-modem1.help:
Specify peer MODEM type for phone1.   
generic:All other modem type.   
actiontec:ActionTec modem.   
ascend_TNT:Ascend TNT modem.

ppp-echo-request1.name: ppp-echo-request1
ppp-echo-request1.help:
Enable/disable PPP echo-request to ISP 1.   
enable:Enable setting.   
disable:Disable setting.

authtype1.name: authtype1
authtype1.help:
Allowed authentication types for ISP 1.   
pap:PAP   
chap:CHAP   
mschap:MSCHAP   
mschapv2:MSCHAPv2

dont-send-CR2.name: dont-send-CR2
dont-send-CR2.help:
Do not send CR when connected (ISP2).

disable:Disable setting.

actiontec:ActionTec modem.   
ascend_TNT:Ascend TNT modem.

ppp-echo-request2.name: ppp-echo-request2

Enable/disable PPP echo-request to ISP 2.   
enable:Enable setting.   
disable:Disable setting.

authtype2.help:
Allowed authentication types for ISP 2.

chap:CHAP

Do not send CR when connected (ISP3).

phone3.name: phone3
phone3.help: Phone number to connect to the dialup account (must not contain spaces, and should include standard special characters).

dial-cmd3.help: Dial command (this is often an ATD or ATDT command).

username3.name: username3
username3.help: User name to access the specified dialup account.

passwd3.name: passwd3
passwd3.help: Password to access the specified dialup account.

peer-modem3.name: peer-modem3
peer-modem3.help:
Specify peer MODEM type for phone3.   
generic:All other modem type.   
actiontec:ActionTec modem.   
ascend_TNT:Ascend TNT modem.

ppp-echo-request3.name: ppp-echo-request3

Enable/disable PPP echo-request to ISP 3.

altmode.help:
Enable/disable altmode for installations using PPP in China.

disable:Disable setting.

authtype3.help:
Allowed authentication types for ISP 3.   
pap:PAP   
chap:CHAP

traffic-check.help:
Enable/disable traffic-check.   
enable:Enable setting.   
disable:Disable setting.

action.name: action
action.help:
Dial up/stop MODEM.   
dial:Dial up number.   
stop:Stop dialup.   
none:No action.
